{{Location Intro|description=<p>{{If Self|Grand Wrestling Grounds|It|The Grand Wrestling Grounds}} is an elevated arena adorned with massive bull horns. It serves as the central hub of the "Collective of Plenty," where the tribe's many athletic competitions are held.</p>}}

It is also known as the '''Resonating Arena'''.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Ardent Land of Plenty}}</ref>
